response.summary:
Electrical engineer, with experience in administration and development (execution) of electrical projects. Design of industrial and residential electrical installations, automation and instrumentation, medium and low voltage substations, earthing and shielding systems, interior and exterior lighting.
10 10 years of experience in lighting designs, and sales of lighting products and projects
#LihgtingDesigner #TunnelLighting #SmartLighntig #
response.skills: Control de iluminación, Research, Spanish, Teaching, Editing, Higher Education, Social Media, English, Microsoft Office, Photoshop, Public Speaking, Science, PowerPoint, Statistics, Matlab, Data Analysis, Translation, Public Relations, University Teaching, SPSS

profile_positions.description: Responsible for providing technical support to the sales team, customers and suppliers in optimized solutions for lighting projects. In addition to providing support in the generation of leads, opening and closing of commercial opportunities; accompanying commercial demonstrations, making project designs and technical specifications
profile_positions.title: Lighting Application Sales Engineer - CALA

profile_positions.description:
Leader in the segment of tunnel lighting projects, infrastructure and industry. Commercial technical support to commercial advisers, Business development and sales closing.
Lighting designs, and technical consultancies
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description: Commercial technical support in presale and business closing in everything related to lighting, product specification and designs
profile_positions.title: Lighting technical advisor

profile_positions.description: Lighting designer for large industrial areas, road lighting, tunnel lighting and other projects
profile_positions.title: Lighting Designer

profile_positions.description: Carry out electrical designs, with their pertinent calculations; lighting, shielding, ground meshes, protection coordination, industrial automation, Subtations and CCM's.
profile_positions.title: Electrical Designer Engineer

profile_positions.description: Execute Electrical and Communications Projects, carrying out design, planning and execution activities that intervene before, during and after each project.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description: Administrative development of projects in lighting and energy efficiency, in inter-administrative agreements between the National University and companies in the public sector and public services
profile_positions.title: Project Assistant

profile_positions.description: Desarrollo administrativo de proyectos en iluminación y eficiencia energética, en convenios interadministrativos entre la Universidad Nacional y empresas del sector publico y de servicios publicos
profile_positions.title: Ing. Administrativo de Proyectos

profile_positions.description: Verificarde avance de obra, supervisor de avance, realizar pedidos y desarrollo de actividades de almacenista de obra
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero Residente de Obra

education.degree_name: specialist degree in public & privated lighting (lighting Dessigner)

company.name: Wesco Anixter
company.description:
At Wesco Anixter, we believe life should run smoothly. As an international provider of business-to-business distribution, logistics services, and supply chain solutions, we create a world that you can depend on. Harnessing 100 years of ingenuity and expertise, we increase profitability, improve productivity, and mitigate risk for approximately 150,000 customers worldwide. With nearly 1.5 million products and locations in Central America, Latin America, Europe, the Middle East, and the Asia Pacific region, Wesco Anixter is your global partner in progress.

Wesco Anixter is a division of Wesco (NYSE: WCC), a FORTUNE 500® company.
